actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an exemption from the overtime compensation provisions of such Act for professional employees of contractors and subcontractors of the Federal Government.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt from overtime compensation provisions professional employees of Federal Government contractors and subcontractors.

titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an exemption from the overtime compensation provisions of such Act for professional employees of contractors and subcontractors of the Federal Government.
